member.name: PrintRoute
member.summary: prints array in form of "The Route is as follows: [start] -> [array0] -> ... -> [array.Length] -> [start]

member.name: MatrixRndSym
member.summary: generates and returns a symmetric matrix with the dimensions NxN with the varaibles between [1,range]

member.name: GetFullPathByFilename
member.summary: gets the full Path of the place the .sln is placed and appends the fileName to the end
member.param: Use any Slashes in this context with \\
